mapper.update: CREATE TABLE team_apply_#{teamId} ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, team_apply_date DATETIME NOT NULL, team_accept_status BIGINT NOT NULL, users_id BIGINT NOT NULL UNIQUE, team_id BIGINT NOT NULL );
mapper.select: SELECT id as id, team_apply_date as teamApplyDate, team_accept_status as teamAcceptStatus, users_id as userId, team_id as teamId FROM team_apply_#{teamId} WHERE team_id = #{teamId}
